doc_title: Pimp Your Prosecco | Shimmers | Gin Gift Sets 🍾 – Popaball
doc_description: Pimp your Prosecco and Gin with our range of Drink Shimmers, Bursting Bubbles, DRIMS, Glitter Gins and more! Pink Prosecco and Gin gifts FROM ONLY £10. Personalise your gift sets by selecting your alcohol to create home cocktail making kits. Perfect alcohol gifts for her, hen parties, weddings, Birthdays and Christmas!
